summary: London is a huge city in England, with over 8 million people living there. It's been an important place for a long time, dating back to Roman times. London is known for many things: it's a global center for business, art, and education. The city has iconic landmarks like Big Ben and Buckingham Palace, and it's home to many museums and theaters. London is also very diverse, with people from all over the world living there, speaking over 300 languages. It's one of the busiest and most exciting cities in Europe.
title: London
